comment: In a Moore system, if ` Y ` is a member of ` S ` , ` ( S \ { Y } ) ` and ` S ` have the same closure if and only if ` Y ` is in the closure of ` ( S \ { Y } ) ` . Used in the proof of ~ mrieqvd and ~ mrieqv2d . Deduction form. (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
